channel.title: Comments on: Writing About Historical Figures
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Arlie
item.dc:creator: Arlie
item.description: Interesting. I read of someone who has written a book on an historical figure and mentioned licensing. I googled companies and I found a company representing intellectual property rights of heirs to famous people. You pay to use their name.
item.content:encoded: Interesting. I read of someone who has written a book on an historical figure and mentioned licensing. I googled companies and I found a company representing intellectual property rights of heirs to famous people. You pay to use their name.
